title: A multiple attribute group decision making model based on 2-tuple linguistic pythagorean fuzzy dombi aggregation operators for optimal selection of potential global suppliers
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Tmader Alballa, Ahmed Alamer, Khadija Nasir, Awais Yousaf, Somayah Abdualziz Alhabeeb, Hamiden Abd El-Wahed Khalifa
